short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This will help you find music quickly!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple music finder which is an extension, and you do not have to type in the artist name and music genre, only one of them will do! After that, it will direct you to YT (youtube) and help you find whatever music you would like to listen to. Enjoy!
